name: Paper Surfer
description:
Dear fellow itcher,

or as we say here in northern germany "Moin Moin"

this Game is a public test of my idea to create a skillbased game with a toucscreen.  Leave some feedback, if you like or don't like it.

How good is your accuracy with the touchscreen? Paper Surfer is a skill game for your fingers. You pilot through different levels and control the difficulty with the players size.  Avoid the obstacles!
